nodes.bodyText:
Spec just says discard after reaching the limit, which is closer to what this code does than the previous FIFO queue (though personally I think either is fine)
https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-specification/blob/master/specification/trace/sdk.md#limits-on-span-collections
Previous code has some checks for Google App Engine - no clue what the delta is but this seems reasonable enough.
I peeked at this a few weeks ago. It looks like it's old app-engine stuff, so I'm not too worried about it.
